      • getLimitations

        public static <T extends LicenseLimitations> T getLimitations(java.lang.Class<T> limitationsDescriptor,
                                              Activator<T> fallback)
        Returns the limitations from the currently loaded license.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the license limitations descriptor.
        Parameters:
        limitationsDescriptor - The limitations descriptor.
        fallback - The fallback factory that produces limitation holder if license is not available.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the license limitations.
